name: Don't Touch The Fire!
description:
What Do You Dislike More Than Spikes? Fire! Stay Alive By Tapping And Bouncing Off Of The Sides, Safely Away From The Flames. You Are Not Fireproof! Keep Avoiding It To Become King Of The Flappy Firebirds! [All Ages]

• Price: Free for a limited time, then $.99
• Universal Compatibility: iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. Requires iOS 5.0 or later
• HD graphics and custom music

Please leave us a review or send feedback for improvement through our support site. Thanks,

Mobixia


***************************************

Stay away from those flames so you don't get burned! This is a great tap bouncer style gameplay that is fun and addicting. It's a flappy style challenge game where it starts out simple but gets increasingly difficult as you progress.

Challenge your friends and see who comes out on top! Great game for some quick fun or to dig in and go for a high score, keeping you challenged for hours! Enjoy

Music by Matthew Pablo
www.matthewpablo.com
